meanings.definition: To make a positive impact or influence on someone
meanings.sent2: His hard work impresses his boss.
meanings.sent3: The puppy impresses everyone with its playful antics.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the sunset impresses upon us the fleeting nature of time.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's dedication impresses upon the students the importance of education.

meanings.definition: To create a strong, lasting effect on someone
meanings.sent1: The movie impresses the audience with its thrilling plot.
meanings.sent2: The grandeur of the cathedral impresses visitors from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The magician impresses the crowd with his amazing tricks.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song impresses upon our hearts a sense of nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The hero's bravery impresses upon us the value of courage in adversity.

meanings.definition: To produce a strong emotional response in someone
meanings.sent1: The tragic story impresses upon us the fragility of life.
meanings.sent2: The painting impresses viewers with its vivid colors.
meanings.sent3: The comedian impresses the audience with his hilarious jokes.
meanings.sent4: The storm impresses upon us the power of nature.
meanings.sent5: The music impresses upon our souls a sense of peace and tranquility.
